alert.note: Alert for Deltana and Tanana Flats (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 20 at 9:48AM AKDT until May 21 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM AKDT SATURDAY FOR DELTANA AND TANANA FLATS... The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 10 AM to 10 PM AKDT Saturday. * AFFECTED AREA...Delta Junction south. * TIMING...10 am to 10 pm Saturday. * WINDS...Southeast 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * TEMPERATURES...70 to 75. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
